xml.title: Buffalo Chicken Wing Sauce
xml.p: If you know someone from Buffalo, they know someone who told them the secret ingredients to the Anchor Bar's famous Buffalo chicken wings. I know people from Buffalo. This is my version, as described to me many years ago, over almost as many beers.
xml.author: By Chef John

section.head: Ingredients
Ingredient Checklist
section.ln: ⅔ cup hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®)

section.head: Directions
section.p: Combine the hot sauce, butter, vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, and salt in a pot and place over medium heat. Bring to a simmer while stirring with a whisk. As soon as the liquid begins to bubble on the sides of the pot, remove from heat, stir with the whisk, and set aside for use.
